testcase.name: Register a new user and send a message
testcase.system-out: Given User is on upskills Home Page.........................................passed When User click on Sign Up link.............................................passed Then Registration Page should display.......................................passed When User selects course type...............................................passed And User enter firstname "Deepika"..........................................passed And User enter lastname "Mittal"............................................passed And User enter emailid "dee@gmail.com"......................................passed And User enter username "DRM2"..............................................passed And User enter password "Password"..........................................passed And User enter confirm password "Password"..................................passed And User clicks on Register button..........................................passed Then verify the Registration confirmation message and firstname "Deepika" and lastname "Mittal".passed And Open the profile dropdown...............................................passed And Validate the email "dee@gmail.com"......................................passed And User click on Inbox link................................................passed And User click on Compose message icon......................................passed And User enters Send to email "DM12"........................................passed And user enters Subject "testmail"..........................................passed And user enters Message to be sent "This is a test mail"....................passed And User clicks on Send message button......................................passed And Message sent and verify the acknowledgement.............................passed
